TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void RespondHandler(object o, RespondArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed RespondHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the RespondHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the RespondHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the RespondHandler is removed from the event.
